resources.string:
You are about to take the ASVAB practice test. 
 This test will have 9 different sections to include: 
 
 General Science 
 Arithmetic Reasoning 
 Word Knowledge 
 Paragraph Comprehension 
 Mathematical Knowledge 
 Electronics Information 
 Automotive Information 
 Shop Information 
 Mechanical Comprehension 
 Assembling Objects 
 
 There is no time limit for this test; however, you should try to complete it within 2 hours. 
 
 Do NOT use any outside resources to include: calculators, google, etc. 
 
 This practice is for YOU and to see how you could do on the real test 
 
 Good luck!

This is the GENERAL SCIENCE section. 
 
 There will be 15 questions. 
 
 Make sure your answers are final - there is no going back to redo previous questions!
